txt.en: 'You should return to your Vanha-väki, this Eglamír. I am sure he will want to know of your failure. Do not forget to tell of the involvement of Mordrambor. What it means, I do not know, but perhaps others will know what it foretells.\n\n'I believe you said he dwells at the Vanha-väki place called Celondim, far to the south and west in the Blue Mountains. I would hurry there and speak with him.'

'Alas! There is little hope now that we may hinder Amarthiel from reforging Narchuil and bringing her armies to bear upon Eriador. Especially if this Lord of Umbar, this Mordrambor you spoke of, is aiding her once more!'
'It would be well for you to return to your Vanha-väki and confess your failure.'
You failed to stop the machinations of Angmar in Forochel, leaving the servants of Amarthiel free to rekindle the forges of Mirobel.
Eglamír is at Celondim in Ered Luin, far to the south and west of Forochel.\n\nYrjänä told you to return to Eglamír with news of your failure.
